properties.areaDesc: Greater Portland Metro Area; Western Columbia River Gorge; Greater Vancouver Area; Western Columbia River Gorge
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 9:19AM PST until January 14 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches
above 500 feet.

* WHERE...In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area and Western
Columbia River Gorge. In Oregon, Greater Portland Metro Area
and Western Columbia River Gorge.

* WHEN...Until 1 PM PST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers mixed with rain, especially
at lower elevations.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON
